languages.text: "Хороня каждого брата, я тайно завидую ему". {n}Угрюмые слова Ульфара падают тяжело, словно обломки скалы в море. Его лицо темнеет и становится похоже на мрачного истукана, высеченного диким народом.{/n}

"Each time I bury a brother, I secretly envy him." {n}Ulfar's mournful words land heavily like cliff rocks cleaving off into the sea. His face darkens until it resembles a grim idol hewn by a primitive people.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Хороня каждого брата, я тайно завидую ему". {n}Угрюмые слова Ульфара падают тяжело, словно обломки скалы в море. Его лицо темнеет и становится похоже на мрачного истукана, высеченного диким народом.{/n}

traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “每当我埋葬我的兄弟时，我都会暗自羡慕他们。”{n}乌尔法哀伤的话语重重地砸在地上，仿佛悬崖上的巨石坠入大海。他的脸色越来越黯淡，变得像原始人凿出的狰狞石像。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Each time I bury a brother, I secretly envy him." {n}Ulfar's mournful words land heavily like cliff rocks cleaving off into the sea. His face darkens until it resembles a grim idol hewn by a primitive people.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “每当我埋葬我的兄弟时，我都会暗自羡慕他们。”{n}乌尔法哀伤的话语重重地砸在地上，仿佛悬崖上的巨石坠入大海。他的脸色越来越黯淡，变得像原始人凿出的狰狞石像。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Cada vez que entierro a uno de mis hermanos, en secreto lo envidio». {n}Las pesarosas palabras de Ulfar retumban como las rocas de un acantilado cayendo al mar. Su rostro se ensombrece hasta que parece un ídolo tallado por un pueblo primitivo.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Each time I bury a brother, I secretly envy him." {n}Ulfar's mournful words land heavily like cliff rocks cleaving off into the sea. His face darkens until it resembles a grim idol hewn by a primitive people.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Cada vez que entierro a uno de mis hermanos, en secreto lo envidio». {n}Las pesarosas palabras de Ulfar retumban como las rocas de un acantilado cayendo al mar. Su rostro se ensombrece hasta que parece un ídolo tallado por un pueblo primitivo.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「兄弟を埋葬するたびに、密かに羨ましく思う」{n}ウルファーの悲痛な言葉は、崖の岩が海へと切り立つように重くのしかかる。彼の顔は、まるで原始の民が切り出した偶像のように暗くなる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Each time I bury a brother, I secretly envy him." {n}Ulfar's mournful words land heavily like cliff rocks cleaving off into the sea. His face darkens until it resembles a grim idol hewn by a primitive people.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「兄弟を埋葬するたびに、密かに羨ましく思う」{n}ウルファーの悲痛な言葉は、崖の岩が海へと切り立つように重くのしかかる。彼の顔は、まるで原始の民が切り出した偶像のように暗くなる。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Jedes Mal, wenn ich einen Bruder begrabe, beneide ich ihn heimlich." {n}Ulfars trauererfüllte Worte landen schwer, wie Klippenfelsen, die sich abspalten und ins Meer stürzen. Seine Miene verdüstert sich immer weiter, bis sie einem grimmigen Götzen ähnelt, von einem primitiven Volk in Stein gehauen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Each time I bury a brother, I secretly envy him." {n}Ulfar's mournful words land heavily like cliff rocks cleaving off into the sea. His face darkens until it resembles a grim idol hewn by a primitive people.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Jedes Mal, wenn ich einen Bruder begrabe, beneide ich ihn heimlich." {n}Ulfars trauererfüllte Worte landen schwer, wie Klippenfelsen, die sich abspalten und ins Meer stürzen. Seine Miene verdüstert sich immer weiter, bis sie einem grimmigen Götzen ähnelt, von einem primitiven Volk in Stein gehauen.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Chaque fois que j'enterre un frère, je le jalouse secrètement. » {n}Les tristes paroles d'Ulfar tombent lourdement, comme des rochers dégringolant d'une falaise jusque dans la mer. Son visage s'assombrit jusqu'à ressembler à une idole sinistre taillée par un peuple primitif.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Each time I bury a brother, I secretly envy him." {n}Ulfar's mournful words land heavily like cliff rocks cleaving off into the sea. His face darkens until it resembles a grim idol hewn by a primitive people.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Chaque fois que j'enterre un frère, je le jalouse secrètement. » {n}Les tristes paroles d'Ulfar tombent lourdement, comme des rochers dégringolant d'une falaise jusque dans la mer. Son visage s'assombrit jusqu'à ressembler à une idole sinistre taillée par un peuple primitif.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: "Each time I bury a brother, I secretly envy him." {n}Ulfar's mournful words land heavily like cliff rocks cleaving off into the sea. His face darkens until it resembles a grim idol hewn by a primitive people.{/n}

languages.text: "Her kardeşimi gömdüğümde içten içe ona özenirim." {n}Ulfar'ın kederli sözleri, denize dökülen kayalıklar gibi yüreğine çarpıyor. Yüzü kararak ilkel insanlar tarafından yontulmuş, suratsız bir mabut benzeri bir hâl alıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Each time I bury a brother, I secretly envy him." {n}Ulfar's mournful words land heavily like cliff rocks cleaving off into the sea. His face darkens until it resembles a grim idol hewn by a primitive people.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Her kardeşimi gömdüğümde içten içe ona özenirim." {n}Ulfar'ın kederli sözleri, denize dökülen kayalıklar gibi yüreğine çarpıyor. Yüzü, ilkel insanlar tarafından yontulmuş, suratsız bir puta benzer şekilde kararıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
